short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A pomodoro extension with a timer that switches between 15 minutes of work, and 5 minutes of break.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension designed to help people stay on task through use of the Pomodoro technique.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique
This extension will:

-Display the timer in the popup
-Alert you when timer ends
-Allow you to change the timer values
-Allow you to pause the timer
-Block most social media sites while you are on the work time
